attributes.action: Immediately stop hiring Diversity heads & staff in all public sector orgs.
attributes.additional_details:
Tax has to be raised to pay for these unnecessary roles.
This freeze will allow the government time to review whether the NHS diversity budget should be totally scrapped.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about whether to hire staff specialising in diversity are an operational matter for individual public agencies, including NHS England and individual NHS trusts, not the Government or House of Commons.

As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.
